name: Meta Chimera
description:
Meta Chimera, formerly Metal Masters, is a somber take on the monster catching genre.  The world of MC isn't a highly functioning socialist one where healing centers are free and children are given their own monster at a certain age.  In this world, the challenge of being the very best like no one ever was isn't just being skilled but also being able to manage your income as a tamer.

Will you continue training a weak Chimera or sell it and purchase more healing items?

The current demo focuses on trying to capture the mood and atmosphere of the game, next I will be focusing on battle mechanics that above themes.
